Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run home run with two outs in the 10th inning
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Boone expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees are going back to the World Series for the first time in 15 years
Others: Giancarlo Stanton hit a two-run homer and was named ALCS MVP
